name: Tuzik
description:
For now the narrative is only in Polish language.

It is an early prototype of a game.  In fact, it's merely a prototype of only one level from the game.

Press RMB to start moving with a dog (white ball). Press SPACE to bark. Stop wolves [grey cubes] from attacking the lady. Don't come to close to them, or they will attack YOU instead.

The game will tell about living on deportation in Siberia. It is based on stories of a person who lived through it. The story in this level was told by a lady who was 4-6 years old during deportation.

Tuzik was a dog who run from village to village (some looong distances) constantly checking on deported Polish people. Like he was taking care of them. Nobody knew that he was hanging around Polish people, until they could share the stories from deportation in the train they were sent back to Poland.  Nobody knows how he got onto the train to Siberia (taking pets was forbidden). Nobody knows how he got to the returning one. But as it seems, Tuzik was watching after the Polish folks all the way through.
